tweets.text: @bradfordmdc @Bradford_TandA @EnvAgencyYNE @BBCLookNorth And what about all the other rubbish which was dumped along the side road at the top of Silverdale Road, reported last week which is now spilled out all over? I suspect the council workers will remove the bags but leave the spilled out litter as they did the last time

#Essex Forest Initiative aims to plant 375,000 trees in county which its estimated will take up about 60,000 tonnes of CO2.  Proposed #Rivenhall waste incinerator, granted a permit by the "environment" agency @EnvAgency will emit approx. ten times that amount of CO2 - every year.

Take your knowledge further with a Flood and Coastal Engineering MSc. 

Scholarships are available, full time for one year starting in September 2021 and will include a 3 month work placement at the @EnvAgency (subject to terms and conditions).

Apply now: https://t.co/cStzUAbhhi https://t.co/zF0m7JF4Bg

entity.name: Through the Keyhole
entity.description: The panel game show `Through the Keyhole' returns with everyone's favourite strawberry-blonde presenter at the helm, Keith Lemon. Let loose to rummage around mystery celebrity houses, Keith unearths clues to the identities of the famous homeowners. Using powers of observation, and the assistance of the studio audience, it's the job of an all-star panel to guess whose home it is.

tweets.text:
This pioneering pontoon is bringing Christmas cheer to the Wear! 

It's a floating ecosystem which as been released into Sunderland marina ‚Äì complete with Christmas tree. 

It will provide pockets of biodiversity and a habitat refuge for critical species! 

#Christmas 
#water https://t.co/oblbZnt8Ro

tweets.text: A short video explaining the steps some residents across the South West have taken to reduce risk to their homes and Be Flood Ready #befloodready @BeFloodReady @EnvAgencySW @TheEPS1 @CwllCFloodForum @CornwallCouncil @DevonAlert @DevComsTogether https://t.co/ahn6hK9wEI

A mile of the River Lugg has been bulldozed to destruction.
Bankside trees grubbed out & burnt.
Riverbed scraped out.
Meanders reprofiled.
Disaster for downstream wildlife.
This was an SSSI.
No consent was sought. 
@EnvAgency must surely prosecute this.
RT
https://t.co/cSBhrR2nDW
